Abyss:ThoughtStealer.NAME: Thought Stealer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains a charge for every card drawn past your first #b{0} each turn. At #b{1} charges, all enemies gain #b{2} #yStrength and heal #b{3}.

Abyss:Berserker.NAME: Berserker
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, this enemy gains #b{0} #yStrength if it is the only enemy left at the end of the round.

Abyss:Resummon.NAME: Resummon
DESCRIPTIONS: #pVoid #pHerald will resummon #pVoid #pSpawn one turn after it dies, with the same amount of #yStrength as #pVoid #pHerald.

Abyss:Abysstouched.NAME: Abysstouched
DESCRIPTIONS: Take #b{0}% more damage from attacks. At the end of your turn, take #b{0} damage.
Target takes #b{0}% more damage from attacks. At the beginning of its turn, the target takes #b{0} damage.

Abyss:DelayedAbysstouched.NAME: Abysstouched
DESCRIPTIONS: Take #b{0}% more damage from attacks. At the end of your turn, take #b{0} damage.

Abyss:Evolving.NAME: Evolving
DESCRIPTIONS: Evolves at the end of each turn.

Abyss:FrailPulse.NAME: Frail Pulse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, apply #b{0} #yFrail.

Abyss:DazedPulse.NAME: Dazed Pulse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, shuffle #b{0} #yDazed into your deck.

Abyss:AbysstouchedPulse.NAME: Abysstouched Pulse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, apply #b{0} #yAbysstouched.

Abyss:SlimyBody.NAME: Slimy Body
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy takes attack damage, add a #ySlimed status to your discard pile.

Abyss:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains #b1 Strength for every #b{0} Max HP you have (rounded up).

Abyss:Wary.NAME: Wary
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, gains #b{0} Strength.

Abyss:PrimevalCall.NAME: Primeval Call
DESCRIPTIONS: Summons a Royal Protector each turn.

Abyss:HandOfTheAbyss.NAME: Hand of the Abyss
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply #b{0} abyss:Abysstouched.

Abyss:BrokenCrystalSeal.NAME: BrokenCrystalSeal
DESCRIPTIONS: Add two Broken Crystals to your deck each turn. NL Fragments of the crystal once used to seal this enemy litter the ground. Use them to weaken it's regeneration!
